name: Breach of the Abyss [ALPHA]
description:
This is Breach of the Abyss, my current project that is still very early in its development.

In a nutshell, the game is about fighting demons in the abyss. It's a top-down shooter, but instead of shooting yourself, you tactically use your troops to do it.

All feedback is highly appreciated, so feel free to leave it in the comments below

Controls:

WASD - Move
MOUSE - target
LMB - "Move over there"
RMB - "Shoot over there
Q - Heal
F - Debug Statistics
